name: Atrio: The Dark Wild
description:
Atrio is a survival game set in a cyberpunk inspired post-apocalyptic world. Bend nature to your will by capturing and enslaving the creatures and environment to help you survive at all costs. The many threats and challenges you will face are too difficult to handle on your own, you must build, automate and optimize your systems to keep the world at bay to stay alive.
Every creature can be captured and bent to your will.
Catch them all and build an army of workers, before they catch you.
Build huge, efficient automation systems to keep your base alive while you explore the world.
Shaped by the contrast of sharp neon lights and darkness and filled with mysterious creatures, Every piece of the world is carefully designed. This 2.5D world is filled to the brim with surprises and mysterious things to discover.
Every creature plays a unique role in the environment, even an unsuspecting deer poop may be the key to your survival.
